import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css';import'./Home.css';import{useCartDispatch}from'./CartContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Check=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[selectedProduct,setSelectedProduct]=useState(null);console.log(selectedProduct);/////////////////  ADD to cart prduct when click AddCart
const dispatch=useCartDispatch();const addToCart=product=>{dispatch({type:'ADD_TO_CART',payload:product});navigate('./Cart');};const clickButton=product=>{setSelectedProduct(product);navigate("/details",{state:{selectedProduct:product}});};const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchProducts=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('https://dummyjson.com/products?limit=100');if(!response.ok){throw new Error("HTTP error! Status: ".concat(response.status));}const data=await response.json();setProducts(data.products);setLoading(false);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching products:',error.message);setError('Error fetching products. Please try again later.');setLoading(false);}};fetchProducts();},[]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:'red'},children:error});}const imageStyle={width:'100%',height:'auto',maxHeight:'140px',border:'2px Solid green',boxShadow:'2px 2px cyan'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-list Aa",children:products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.thumbnail,alt:product.title,style:imageStyle,onClick:()=>clickButton(product)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["$",product.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Rating: ",product.rating]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Brand: ",product.brand]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>addToCart(product),className:"btn btn-warning m-2",children:"ADD TO CART"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>clickButton(product),className:"btn btn-primary",children:"BUY NOW"})]},product.id))})});};export default Check;
